#summary 静态化管理.
#labels free,cms,freecms,freeteam,开源,免费,内容管理系统,静态化管理

= 静态化管理 =
<p>
	 </p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	FreeCMS<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">采用的站点模板概念，所以经过静态化后站点先能显示。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	1. 首页静态化</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从左侧管理菜单点击首页静态化进入。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134029_4Xbo_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134029_4Xbo_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	系统会直接提示您是否对当前站点进行首页静态化处理，点击"确定"按钮。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134045_yIL5_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134045_yIL5_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134058_86NN_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134058_86NN_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	系统会在此站点目录下生成<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">index.html</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">文件作为站点首页。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	2. 栏目页静态化</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从左侧管理菜单点击栏目页静态化进入。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134137_fpAg_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134137_fpAg_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	您可以选择需要生成的栏目，然后点击"生成所选栏目页"进行栏目页静态化。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	如果您是此站点的总管理员，您也可以点击"生成此站点所有栏目页"完成对此站点所有栏目的静态化。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	系统会在此站点目录下创建一个以栏目<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">id</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">为名字的文件夹用于存放此栏目的静态化页面。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从FreeCMS 1.2 开始支持</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	可以设置生成前多少页，如设置只生成前<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">30</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">页，则程序只生成前</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">30</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">页的静态页面。如果实际数据少于</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">30</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">页，则总页数以实际数据为准；如果实际数据多于</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">30</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">页，则总页数为</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">30</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">页。</span></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	3. 信息页静态化</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	从左侧管理菜单点击信息页静态化进入。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134214_kDEg_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; color: rgb(68, 102, 187); outline: 0px;" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/134214_kDEg_916014.png" style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 640px; cursor: pointer;" /></a></p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	您可以选择需要生成的栏目，然后点击"生成信息页面"进行信息页静态化。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	如果您是此站点的总管理员，您也可以把"是否所有栏目"属性选择为是，点击"生成信息页面"完成对此站点所有栏目的信息页静态化。</p>
<p style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 15pt; line-height: 1.5; letter-spacing: 1px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Verdana, sans-serif, 宋体; font-size: 14px;">
	系统会在此站点目录<span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">/</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">栏目</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">id/info/YYYY/</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">目录下生成以信息</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">id</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">为名字的</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">.html</span><span style="padding: 0px; margin: 0px;">静态页面。</span></p>
